product_overview: A home and family task management app tailored specifically for overwhelmed dads. It uses AI to provide personalized, context-aware task suggestions and project breakdowns to help prevent household disasters, ease partner burnout, and keep ahead of seasonal and relationship maintenance.
core_goals: Deliver a highly personalized task management experience using AI that adapts to user's family situation, location, and behavioral patterns.
Prevent home and family disasters through proactive seasonal and maintenance task suggestions.
Simplify complex home projects by breaking them down into achievable steps for weekends and manageable time frames.
Reduce stress and overwhelm by providing streamlined task management modes during high-stress periods.
Engage users with a motivational and relatable onboarding and app walkthrough that reinforces emotional and practical benefits.
Support productivity and task completion with smart notifications, analytics, and achievement systems that sustain user engagement.
key_features: AI-Powered Personalization generating dynamic tasks based on contextual data including family details, time, location, and behavioral patterns.
Comprehensive Task Management System with CRUD operations, completion, snoozing, bulk actions, and status tracking.
Projects & Fixes Browse Category featuring large home maintenance projects marked as projects and broken down by AI for weekend completion.
Engaging 6-step App Walkthrough guiding new users through key benefits focusing on disaster prevention, partner relief, and project management.
Daily AI Check-in with conversational AI mentor providing task suggestions, motivation, and contextual guidance.
Voice Task Creation using speech-to-text transcription for hands-free task entry.
Emergency Mode to detect overwhelm and simplify task views for high-stress moments.
User Onboarding Questionnaire collecting family info, housing status, priorities, and location for tailored AI customization.
Mobile-Optimized Dashboard with responsive design and touch-friendly navigation.
Smart Push Notifications with contextual reminders and achievement updates.
Seasonal Task Intelligence adapting suggestions by regional weather and state.
Relationship and Child Age-Specific Task Suggestions improving relevance by tracking family context and developmental milestones.
Achievement and Behavioral Pattern Tracking offering streaks, milestones, and productivity insights.
Sidekick AI Chat providing conversational assistance beyond tasks.
user_flow_summary: User signs up or logs in via Firebase Authentication with email/password or Google login.
Upon first use, user completes a multi-step onboarding questionnaire collecting family makeup, homeownership, priorities, and location.
User is presented with a 6-step engaging app walkthrough explaining empathic pain points, AI features, seasonal awareness, project breakdown, and relationship benefits.
Users browse task categories including a new Projects & Fixes category with large home maintenance projects broken down by AI.
Users can create, update, complete, snooze, or bulk manage tasks and convert tasks into multi-step projects with AI-powered subtask breakdowns.
User receives daily AI check-ins and notifications for contextual task reminders and motivational support.
User can record voice tasks for quick input using integrated transcription service.
During high-stress periods, user can activate Emergency Mode for simplified task management.
Users track progress and achievements via dashboard analytics and personalized performance insights.
validation_criteria: Successful Firebase Authentication implementation supporting Google and email/password methods.
Onboarding questionnaire correctly collects and stores user context information for AI customization.
App Walkthrough triggers for first-time users and completes progress tracking properly.
Projects & Fixes browse category displays correctly with project tasks and AI-generated breakdown subtasks.
Dynamic task generation adapts accurately to user context, family data, location, and behavioral patterns.
Daily AI check-in provides relevant, motivating, and context-aware guidance without errors.
Voice task creation records and transcribes speech accurately to task entries.
Emergency Mode activates appropriately upon overwhelm detection and simplifies the UI.
Push notifications deliver timely, contextual reminders and achievement notices based on task and behavior data.
Mobile dashboard responsiveness and touch navigation function smoothly across devices and screen sizes.
Achievement system correctly tracks streaks, milestones, and unlocks features as expected.
Sidekick AI Chat responds to user inputs with relevant productivity and task suggestions.
Seasonal and relationship task suggestions update based on real-time contextual inputs as designed.
